column4: Hey Can i make a fresh install of Ubuntu from the Ubuntu-Alternative-Dapper ISO ????
Hey Can i make a fresh install of Ubuntu from the Ubuntu-Alternative-Dapper ISO ????
how do i get write access to my WINDOWS FAT partition from breezy?
mounting it write able for your user
how is that done? please help me out
hm that's something which should really be fixed in ubuntu for newer users .... you're the second one i have to tell ;-)

yourusername should be your username then, yes
